original_text: And they bound the breastpiece by its rings to the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, so that it should lie on the skillfully woven band of the ephod, and that the breastpiece should not come loose from the ephod, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 청색 끈으로 흉패 고리와 에봇 고리에 꿰어 흉패로 정교하게 짠 에봇 띠 위에 붙여서 에봇에서 벗어지지 않게 하였으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they bound the breastpiece by its rings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 가슴받이를 그 고리로 묶었고

sentences.original_text: to the rings of the ephod
on the skillfully woven band of the ephod
and that the breastpiece should not come loose
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가슴받이가 떨어지지 않게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses
